body:
This test hasn't passed a single time in the last week on GCE.

The failure typically looks like the following:


@mwielgus @gurvindersingh not sure which of you want to take this

cc @kubernetes/goog-testing for good measure too

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: "Spark should start spark master, driver and workers" e2e test continuously failing
